titleStmt.title: [A tragedye or enterlude manyfestyng the chefe promyses of God unto man by all ages in the olde lawe from the fall of Adam to the incarnacyon of the lorde Iesus Christ. Compyled by Johan Bale ...]
Chief promises of God unto man
titleStmt.author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.

notesStmt.note: A2r, line 1 of text: If profyght may growe, moste Christe[n] audye[n]ce.
Imperfect; A1, title page, lacking; title supplied from Greg.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
